name: Harry-potter-text-adventure
tagline: This is a repository for webpages which from which my text adventures will be playable.
body:
### Harry Potter text adventure: Book 1: Chapter 1
This is the first chapter for my Harry Potter text adventure. I would like to note that this is not approved by J.K. Rowling or Warner Bros. I just like Harry Potter, and I like programming. This game was made with Inform 7.
### Downloading the game
If you download the game, you will need a glulxe interpreter. The two I know of are:

[Glulxe](http://www.eblong.com/zarf/glulx/) and [Gargoyle](http://ccxvii.net/gargoyle/)

The download for the game can be found [here:](https://github.com/ojzcroc/HPIF/raw/master/Projects/Harry%20Potter%20and%20the%20Philosopher%27s%20stone%20Ch1%20Materials/Release/Harry%20Potter%20and%20the%20Philosophe.gblorb)

[Play The Game](https://github.com/ojzcroc/HPIF/blob/master/Projects/Harry%20Potter%20and%20the%20Philosopher%27s%20stone%20Ch1%20Materials/Release/play.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
